column1: Baby Barnaby's////When I feel like getting out my habitual routine
column2: I've ordered the Green Eggs with no cheese (lactose intolerant) and the Bob's Healthy Plate. Both are delish. The salsa is spot on. The chicken apple sausage tastes like Thanksgiving in your mouth (seriously
column3: I can only eat half it's so rich). And the amount of food on your plate for the price cannot be beat.
